title: ‘Police need to investigate’: will Andrew be questioned over his relationship with Epstein?
summary_full: As calls for the former prince to cooperate with police become deafening, this may be the reckoning Andrew cannot outrunGordon Brown is a man who gets into the detail.In office, and since then, he has applied his forensic mind to the matters that concern him. Lately, he has been focused on the Epstein files. Continue reading...
